articles.title: Epson adds to low running cost EcoTank Pro printer range - iTWire
articles.description: Epson's latest EcoTank Pro printers are aimed at home offices and small businesses. The EcoTank Pro ET-5150 and EcoTank Pro ET-5170 are the ideal replacement for messy, expensive and heat-producing laser printers, according to the company.
